newsitem.title: GREECE: GREEK SOCIALISTS GIVE GREEN LIGHT TO PM FOR ELECTIONS.
newsitem.headline: GREEK SOCIALISTS GIVE GREEN LIGHT TO PM FOR ELECTIONS.

text.p: The Greek socialist party's executive bureau gave the green light to Prime Minister Costas Simitis to call snap elections, its general secretary Costas Skandalidis told reporters.
Prime Minister Costas Simitis is going to make an official announcement after a cabinet meeting later on Thursday, said Skandalidis. --Dimitris Kontogiannis, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
